A virtual reality experience that simulates the sensation of climbing a mountain while dancing.
A short film that depicts a mountain as a living being with a passion for dance, featuring stunning visuals and graceful choreography.
A line of dance-inspired clothing and accessories, such as tops with built-in speakers that play music as you move, or shoes with embedded sensors that track your dance moves.
A mobile app that uses augmented reality to teach users how to dance like a mountain, with tutorials and exercises tailored to different skill levels and dance styles.
A dance-theater performance that combines traditional mountain culture with contemporary dance, exploring themes of movement, identity, and connection to the natural world.
